channel.title: Comments for page "Wake the Snake"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wake the Snake"

item.title: Reference
item.content:encoded:
It might be also a reference to an "lol cats" motivational. I found the image on google, but I'm not sure how long any of these sites will keep the image up; so I provided three different links to it.

http://www.laughingmyassoff.com/images/posts/15e0420080714160151000000c00a.jpeg
http://www.masticando.com/blog/wp-content/2006/10/show_pokemans.jpg
http://www.vgblogger.com/wp-content/uploads/2006/11/30/ShowYouPokemans.jpg

Incase it doesn't display - google search "pokemans let me show you them" and your bound to find it. But basically the quest and the image share relativily the same lines, just in a different context.

In addition the image in itself might even be a reference to something else with similar text. But I'm not sure about that.

item.title: Trivia....
item.content:encoded: I think the final line of the quest regarding the player being abusive to SNAKEMAN is a reference to how sasuke treats Orochimaruâ€¦ For instance, Sasuke almost always disrespects orochi, ends up attacking (and taking over) him, and ends up replacing him. The quest makes a reference to how the player integrates orochi into the game. Just a bit of trivia~
